mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT REFERENCE,rnum, TITLE, VENUE, hc.* FROM hospital hp LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT hc_rnum, AVG(H_SCORE) "AVG" FROM hospital_comment GROUP BY hc_rnum) hc ON hp.rnum = hc.hc_rnum WHERE subjectcategory = '동물병원' AND VENUE LIKE #{addr} AND TITLE LIKE #{title} AND REFERENCE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY AVG
